title: Art Director, Marketing Communications
summary: Marcom is looking for an Art Director to join our marketing and communications team. You will work with a Copywriter and a team of hardworking creatives to build concepts across all mediums for products, product launches and campaigns. You have a deep love of Apple and Apple products. Your work will be seen by Apple customers all over the world.
description:
-  You will art direct, design, review, and empower campaigns for the Apple brand and products.
-  You will present work to senior creative staff and product marketing managers. 
-  Collaborate with a Copywriter to concept ideas, and with designers to help bring them to life.
-  Work across subject areas, to integrate strategies and messaging for social media, online, retail, channel, events, advertising and new mediums of communication. 
-  You should be ready to do the best work of your life.
key_qualifications:
Must provide a creative portfolio or work samples
Industry experience concepting, art-directing and producing major marketing, communication or advertising campaigns.
preferred_qualifications:
You have proven experience in ideating award-winning, mold-breaking, culture-shifting work.
Your work is grounded in original ideas, implemented with outstanding craft and meticulous attention to detail.
You have produced work in multifaceted mediums of advertising, social media, conceptual campaigns, product launches, branding, photography, film and video.
You are passionate about excellent art direction and design that is thoughtful, meaningful, provocative at times, clear and inspiring.
You are used to working proactively in a creative and dynamic environment.
You understand the worlds and language of film and photo production.
You have an eye for the aesthetic and the ability to create a powerful story through your work.
